node.name: Dilemma
node.description: Dilemma, The Would You Rather Game, is a conversation or party game that poses a dilemma in the form of a question beginning with "would you rather"

node.name: distributed-online-marketplace-system
node.description: a distributed online marketplace system that relies on a distributed database model.

node.name: Evaluate-Articles-with-NLP
node.description: a web tool that allows users to run Natural Language Processing (NLP) on articles or blogs found on other websites by submitting a URL of an article using meaningcloud API.

node.name: Banker-s-Algorithm
node.description: The Banker algorithm sometimes referred to as the detection algorithm, is a resource allocation and deadlock avoidance algorithm

node.name: three-tier-distributed-monitoring-system
node.description: Implementation of an Application Level Protocol (ALP) at each level of nodes using multi-threaded Java programming.

node.name: image-processing-api
node.description: API can be used in two different ways. As a simple placeholder API, the first allows you to place images into your frontend with the size set via URL parameters (and additional stylization if you choose) for rapid prototyping. The second use case is as a library to serve properly scaled versions of your images to the front end to reduce page load size. Rather than needing to resize and upload multiple copies of the same image to be used throughout your site, the API you create will handle resizing and serving stored images for you.
